rows.label: tlk45500421_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Hohohoh... Just a few bites of
choclit, before she comes back...

rows.label: tlk45500421_02_msg0002
rows.name:
Wha-?! Who's there?! Don't talk
to me out of the blue like that!

rows.label: tlk45500421_02_msg0003
rows.name:
You gave me such a fright,
I thought my heart might
stop then and there!

rows.label: tlk45500421_02_msg0004
rows.name:
I'm just glad it was you and not
her... She'd kill me if she saw
me gorging on this stuff.
